items.title: Microsoft Releases Urgent Fix for Sharepoint Vulnerability Being Used in Global Cyberattacks
items.description: Hackers have taken advantage of zero-day exploit to carry out widespread attacks.

items.description: … and two other tricky workplace dilemmas.

items.title: A Brand-New Study Says  Exercise Can Significantly Boost Your Mood and Mental Health– But With 1 ‘Meaningful’ Catch
items.description: Exercise is good for your body. But if also want exercise to improve your mood, and help you feel better about yourself, the context matters.

items.title: How the Fed Unintentionally Broke Small Business Lending–And What You Can Do About It
items.description: It’s not your imagination–borrowing has become harder. Here’s what happened and how you can overcome it.

items.title: A Top Fed Official Is Ready to Dissent Against Jerome Powell
items.description: Fed Governor Christopher Waller wants to cut interest rates immediately.
